\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	M \& Q \&\& M \& Y \& {C_0} \\
	M \& {\widetilde P} \&\& M \& {\widetilde X} \& {C_2} \\
	M \& P \&\& M \& X \& {C_3}
	\arrow["q", from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["j", hook, from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow[from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow[from=1-6, to=2-6]
	\arrow["{\widetilde p}", from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\widetilde i}", hook, from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-5, to=2-6]
	\arrow[from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow[from=2-6, to=3-6]
	\arrow["p", from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["i", hook, from=3-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow[two heads, from=3-5, to=3-6]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
